title: A Capsule Network for Hierarchical Multi-label Image Classification
venue: Structural, Syntactic, and Statistical Pattern Recognition
excerpt: This paper is about the multi-label image classification using a capsule network.
citation: K. T. Noor, A. Robles-Kelly, and B. Kusy, A Capsule Network for Hierarchical Multi-label Image Classification", in Structural, Syntactic, and Statistical Pattern Recognition, A. Krzyzak, C. title: H-CapsNet: A capsule network for hierarchical image classification
excerpt: This paper is about hierarchical multi-label image classification using a capsule network.
citation: K. T. Noor and A. Robles-Kelly, H-CapsNet: A capsule network for hierarchical image classification", Pattern Recognition, vol. 147, p. 110135, Mar. 2024, doi: 10.1016/j.patcog.2023.110135."

title: A Bottom-Up Capsule Network for Hierarchical Image Classification
venue: 2023 International Conference on Digital Image Computing: Techniques and Applications (DICTA)

citation: K. T. Noor, A. Robles-Kelly, L. Y. Zhang, and M. R.
